trans-unit.source: Format uri ('{0}') uses a substitution placeholder but pattern did not capture anything.
Format uri ('{0}') must contain exactly one substitution placeholder.
Start debugging with the 'Debugger for Chrome'.
What to do with the URI when the server is ready.
Open URI externally with the default application.
Name of the launch configuration to run.
Server is ready if this pattern appears on the debug console. The first capture group must include a URI or a port number.
Act upon a URI when a server program under debugging is ready (indicated by sending output of the form 'listening on port 3000' or 'Now listening on: https://localhost:5001' to the debug console.)
A format string used when constructing the URI from a port number. The first '%s' is substituted with the port number.
Value passed to the debug configuration for the 'Debugger for Chrome'.
Open URI in browser if server under debugging is ready.
